pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 24, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit and meet with employees of Algoma Steel Inc.

Algoma Steel Inc. 
No. 2 Gate, Administration Building
105 West Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.
  • Long sleeves, long pants, and flat-soled closed shoes are mandatory.

Antigonish, Nova Scotia

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of Nova Scotia Stephen McNeil.

CACL Community Centre
75 St. Ninian Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
